name: Beat Fighter (Konnorz0104)
description:
This is a Game Jam Game Created by 4 students - Demi Liu, Connor Zhang, Qihuan Jiang, and Mina Li. 

2D, Rhythm-like, mini-casual game. 

Control: 

Arrow Key - Collect different colored Square

Mouse Click - Basic Interaction on Menu Page

Please Enjoy ! 

Demi Liu - Game Designer, Game Developer

Connor Zhang - Game Designer, UI Design & Develop, Audio Designer

Qihuan Jiang - Visual Designer, UI Designer

Mina Li - Artist

Thank you so much for playing. 

Please leave comments!
